name: RunnerID Dark Theme WIP
description: As a fellow user of RunnerID system, we spend hours looking at the default white themed system. Not only it's horrible for our eyes, it's also horrible in terms of power consumption. So, I had enough and created this dark version. It's only the base of the coding, additional details will be fixed in due time.
additional_info:
This theme is not associated with RunnerID staff, their work or company. A side alone theme for the system written by me. I WILL NOT be responsible for any harm, damage or harmful side effects this theme might have.
As is right now, code is 112 lines long. 114 lines with Mozilla Export.
